planet.description: The planet Tau Boötis b was one of the first exoplanets to be discovered back in 1996. In 2012, astronomers have detected the faint glow that is emitted from the planet, reliably probing the structure of the atmosphere of Tau Bootis b and deducing its mass accurately for the first time.
